text: orearra sattayil ninn ninnale srsticcavananavan. atil ninnutanne atinre inayeyum srsticcu. a inayeateatt santrpti netan. avan avale punarnnu. annane aval garbhattinre laghuvaya bharam vahiccu. aval atum cumannu natannu. pinnit atavalkk bharamayappeal avariruvarum tannalute nathanaya allahuveat prarthiccu: "nannalkk ni nallearu kunnine tarikayanenkil tirccayayum nannalennum nandiyullavarayirikkum.”
